channel.title: Welcome to Santhoshini's Archive on SG'Log
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Santhoshini's Archive on SG'Log

item.title: Language-guided image tokenization
item.description: This project aims to improve comression ratio by using language guidance in ViT-based image tokenizers. The goal is to evaluate and explore multimodal interactions needed between language and images needed for tokenization.

item.title: Real-time 3D Scene Reconstruction
item.description: This project aims to improve comression ratio by using language guidance in ViT-based image tokenizers. The goal is to evaluate and explore multimodal interactions needed between language and images needed for tokenization.
